nj flexi cap fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate long term capital appreciation by investing in equity and equity related instruments across market capitalizations. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the scheme will be achieved.
nj flexi cap fund.type_of_the_scheme:: An open ended dynamic equity scheme investing across large cap, mid cap, small cap stocks
nj flexi cap fund.exit_load: Nil Exit load  for 5% of the units upto completion of 30 days  The First In First Out (FIFO) logic will be applied while selecting the units for redemption  Waiver of Exit load is calculated for each inflow transaction separately on FIFO basis and not on the total units through multiple inflows  The load free units from purchases made subsequent to the initial purchase will be available only after redeeming all units from the initial purchase All units redeemed /switched-out in excess of the 5% load free units will be subject to the below mentioned exit load.  1.00% - if Units are redeemed/switched-out on or before 30 days from the date of allotment  Nil - if redeemed after 30 days from the date of allotment.
work_experience:: Mr. Dhaval Patel - 17 years and Mr.
managing_the_scheme_since:: managing the scheme since September 6, 2023 and Mr.
Viral Shah is managing the scheme from May 1, 2024.
minimum_investment: For Lumpsum Investment: INR 500/- and in multiple of
INR 1/- thereafter
For SIP Investment: INR 100/- and in multiple of INR 1/-
For STP and SWP Investment: INR 500/- and in multiple
of INR 1/- thereafter
additional_investment_amount: INR 500 and multiples of INR 1/- thereafter
metrics: Note: Portfolio Beta, Standard Deviation, R Squared and Sharpe Ratio of
the Scheme are not computed owing to the short time frame since launch
IDCW history is not available since no income is distributed since the
# # Total Expense Ratio is as on the last business day of the month and
incudes Additional Expenses and Goods & Service Tax on Management
DISCLAIMER: MUTUAL FUND INVESTMENTS ARE SUBJE

nj balanced advantage fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to generate capital appreciation by dynamically allocating its assets between equity and specified debt securities. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the scheme will be achieved.
nj balanced advantage fund.type_of_the_scheme:: An open-ended dynamic asset allocation fund
nj balanced advantage fund.exit_load: 1. NIL Exit load  for 5% of the units upto completion of 30 days  The First In First Out (FIFO) logic will be applied while selecting the units for redemption  Waiver of Exit load is calculated for each inflow transaction separately on FIFO basis and not on the total units through multiple inflows  The load free units from purchases made subsequent to the initial purchase will be available only after redeeming all units from the initial purchase 2. All units redeemed /switched-out in excess of the 5% load free units will be subject to the below mentioned exit load.  1.00% - if Units are redeemed/switched-out on or before 30 days from the date of allotment  Nil - if redeemed after 30 days from the date of allotment.
work_experience:: Mr. Viral Shah - 20 years, Mr. Dhaval
managing_the_scheme_since:: October 20, 2022. Mr. Dhaval Patel since March 8, 2023
minimum_investment: For Lumpsum Investment: INR 500/- and in multiple of INR
1/- thereafter
For SIP Investment: INR 100/- and in multiple of INR 1/-
For STP and SWP Investment: INR 500/- and in multiple of
INR 1/- thereafter
additional_investment_amount: INR 500 and multiples of INR 1/- thereafter
metrics: Computed for the 3 years period ended December 31,2024.
Based on the month end NAV.

nj arbitrage fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to generate capital appreciation and income by predominantly investing in arbitrage opportunities in the cash and derivatives segment of the equity market and by investing the balance in debt and money market instruments. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the scheme will be achieved.
nj arbitrage fund.type_of_the_scheme:: An open ended scheme investing in arbitrage opportunities

nj overnight fund.investment_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to seek to generate returns commensurate with risk of investments in overnight instruments.However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the investment objective of the scheme will be achieved.
nj overnight fund.type_of_the_scheme:: An open ended debt scheme investing in overnight securities with a relatively low interest rate risk and relatively low credit risk
